SELECT u.id, u.login_name loginName, u.user_name realName, d.id departmentId, d.dep_name departmentName, r.role_code roleCode, r.role_name roleName FROM user u left join rel_dep_user rdu on u.id=rdu.user_id left join department d on d.id=rdu.dep_id left join rel_pos_user rpu on u.id=rpu.user_id left join position p on p.id=rpu.pos_id left join rel_role_user rru on rru.user_id=u.id left join role r on r.id=rru.role_id where u.company_id=d.company_id and u.company_id=p.company_id and u.company_id=#{companyId} and u.is_del=0 and u.is_outtage=0 and r.is_outtage=2 and login_name=#{userName} and `password` =#{passWord};
select u.id, u.login_name loginName, u.user_name userName from user u where u.is_admin=1 and u.is_del=0 and u.is_outtage=0 and u.login_name=#{userName} and u.password=#{base64Password};
